trans-unit.source: Provides a data-binding handler for a hyperlink property.
trans-unit.target: 提供超链接属性的数据绑定处理程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个名为的类`CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`，它派生自`HyperLinkDataBindingHandler`类。

trans-unit.source: It resolves design-time data binding for the `CustomHyperLink` class using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HyperLinkDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它解析为设计时数据绑定`CustomHyperLink`类使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.HyperLinkDataBindingHandler.DataBindControl%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HyperLinkDataBindingHandler" /> class.
The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> for the document that contains the control.

trans-unit.target: 要将数据绑定到的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Resolves design-time data-binding for the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 为指定控件解析设计时数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: This method determines whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control are data-bound.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>控件是数据绑定。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A> property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to "DataBound".
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>属性为数据绑定，此方法设置为"数据绑定"属性的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> property is data-bound, this method sets the value of the property to a text string so the control will have the appearance of a working hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为数据绑定，此方法为文本字符串设置属性的值，因此该控件将具有工作超链接的外观。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a class, named `CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`, which derives from the `HyperLinkDataBindingHandler` class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建一个名为的类`CustomHyperLinkDataBindingHandler`，它派生自`HyperLinkDataBindingHandler`类。

trans-unit.source: It resolves design-time data binding for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> property of the `CustomHyperLink` class so that placeholder text is displayed for the property when it is data-bound at design time.
trans-unit.target: 它解析为设计时数据绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>属性`CustomHyperLink`类，以便当它被数据绑定在设计时，将占位符文本显示的属性。
